lib.api.terminal 源代码

# coding: utf-8
import requests
import json
from generic import Generic as g



[文档]class Terminal(object):
    '''

接口列表：
 - 获取分店列表
 - 添加分店
 - 删除分店

    '''

############################# 分店管理 ############################

[文档]    def terminal_list(self, conf, args):
            '''
            获取分店列表
            '''
            url = "/terminal/list-ajax"
            return g.post_requests(conf, url, args, terminal=True)



[文档]    def terminal_add(self, conf, args):
            '''
            添加分店
            '''
            url = "/terminal/add-ajax"
            return g.post_requests(conf, url, args, terminal=True)

    

[文档]    def main_sub_open(self, conf, shopID):
        '''
        开启分店店铺模式
        '''
        url = '/shop/main-sub-open-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=shopID, terminal=True)    

    

[文档]    def main_sub_close(self, conf, shopID):
        '''
        关闭分店店铺模式
        '''
        url = '/shop/main-sub-close-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=shopID, terminal=True)

[文档]    def terminal_reduction_list(self,conf,args):
        '''
        分店收款码满减送列表
        '''
        url = '/terminal-reduction/list-by-terminal-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args, terminal=True)

    

[文档]    def terminal_reduction_add(self,conf,args):
        '''
         添加分店收款码满减送活动
        '''
        url = '/terminal-reduction/add-by-terminal-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args, terminal=True)

    

[文档]    def terminal_reduction_open(self,conf,reductionID):
        '''
        开启分店收款码满减送活动
        '''
        url = '/terminal-reduction/open-by-terminal-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=reductionID, terminal=True)



[文档]    def terminal_reduction_close(self,conf,reductionID):
        '''
        关闭分店收款码满减送活动
        '''
        url = '/terminal-reduction/close-by-terminal-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=reductionID, terminal=True)    

    

[文档]    def reduction_store_list(self,conf,args):

        已选择的门店（包含代理商终端店信息）

        url = '/terminal-reduction/reduction-store-list-ajax'

[文档]    def terminal_reduction_delete(self,conf,reductionID):
        '''
        删除门店满减活动
        '''
        url = '/terminal-reduction/delete-by-terminal-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, id=reductionID, terminal=True)

[文档]    def order_statistics_by_shop(self, conf, args):
        '''
        根据门店统计订单、对账单统计、结算信息
        '''
        url = '/data/order-by-shop-ajax'
        return g.post_requests(conf, url, args, terminal=True)
